data.message: I was just restricted to my account again for sharing my own event to local town groups.  Can you please remove the restriction, this is hurting a local craft event by me not being able to post about it.  Please let me know if you can help me.  I dont want to affect other peoples businesses because I cannot promote it now.

replies.message: Facebook please dont tell me to report it, we have all done that, we need access to our accounts that are supposed to be ours and a way to actually contact someone that can help.  There has to be a simple solution where you can unrestrict our accounts

Thanks for reaching out, Jennifer. If you're temporarily blocked from sharing this event, it may be because you have overused the feature. This block is temporary, and you can still use other Facebook features to connect with your Facebook friends while you're in this block. -Mollie

Facebook Mollie I can’t. And the only place I can reply is here so my event is going to be awful since I cannot post about it. My block is till the 28th and my event is on the 2nd. I need to be advertising every day.  I shared it to 2 groups and then got blocked!
